changeSet.comment: Delete Vendor Type that will not work and has never been used in Production
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE KFS.PUR_VNDR_HDR_TX ADD ( VNDR_CHPT4_STAT_CD VARCHAR2(2 BYTE), VNDR_W8_BEN_RCVD_DT DATE, VNDR_FRGN_TAX_NBR VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), VNDR_GIINBR VARCHAR2(19 BYTE), VNDR_FRGN_RECIPNT_BIRTH_DT DATE ) / CREATE TABLE KFS.PUR_VNDR_CHPT4_STAT_CD_TC ( VNDR_CHPT4_STAT_CD VARCHAR2(2 BYTE), VNDR_CHPT4_STAT_CD_DESC VARCHAR2(100 BYTE), OBJ_ID VARCHAR2(36 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, VER_NBR NUMBER(8,0) DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL ENABLE, ROW_ACTV_IND VARCHAR2(1 BYTE), CONSTRAINT PUR_VNDR_CHPT4_STAT_CD_TC_TP1 PRIMARY KEY (VNDR_CHPT4_STAT_CD)) /
